The developers are incompetent children. I got permanent banned for ‘editing my save file’?

Look at the upload dates for the videos & the screenshots below, as I have never changed my save file. The most I’ve ever done, is copy the save file & paste it elsewhere on my hard drive in case I ever lost it (like we were told to do a while back in this thread from a developer) - 
https://steamcommunity.com/app/381210/discussions/0/1843493219431981208/  

These videos (below) say they’re published on 8/18/2018 as I opened them to public then to show everyone my progression, but they were uploaded on the day I say they were, I took several screenshots showing this from the youtube page. You can probably tell by the older UI and the older perk icons with the thicker black border anyway, but I’m showing everyone my old progress & that it hasn’t changed drastically over several months. You can even see the date in the bottom right hand corner of my computer screen before I open the game in the videos.

Full Progression as of 8/18/2018 (a day after I’ve been banned for ‘hacking my save file’) 8/18/2018 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FlIA2B1b55M

Like I said, I’ve never edited my save file. I have no reason to (2000+ hours). In the video (8/18/2018), I still only have the two killer legacy’s that I earned. The videos show this. The screenshots show this. Look at the upload date on my screenshots. The most I’ve done to my save file is copy and paste it elsewhere on my hard drive (like we players were told to do) when the save-erase bug was going around. I still don’t understand what part of my save file was ‘changed’ or ‘edited’ as I’ve never done anything to my save other than what was greenlit by the developers themselves.

I’ve never been given a direct answer. They don’t have a direct answer because their moderator team is full of immature narcissistic apes with a superiority complex who are ban-happy with whoever they feel like & nobody calls them out on it.

I'm showing anyone who's interested my progression over the past two years & I don't understand what is it that I'm accused to have 'changed'. I’ve been a part of this game since before the beta, pre-ordered the game, bought every DLC, spent money on Auric Cells, & now I’m being permanently banned for something I didn’t even do? Even after I'm showing everyone all of my progression over 2 years? 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1487420814&fileuploadsuccess=1

After continuing to request information on my ban, the moderator team of Dead by Daylight took it upon themselves to completely delete my support ticket.

F*cking waste of time & a joke of a company.

I highly recommend this game to other players.

This is an absolutely incredible game that has brought me and my friends countless hours of fun. I would highly recommend purchasing this game to anyone with a group of friends to play it with.

Вот и настало время писать обзор на [strike] симулятор весения на крюке [/strike] DBD.
Допустим, что это пролог: DBD это игра [strike] где 4 сурва е*ут 1-го маньяка или наоборот [/strike] Где 4 выживших должны сбежать от маньяка заводя Generatorы. А маньяк должен вешать сурвов на [strike] вонючие, грязные [/strike] крюки или  [spoiler] распилить, проколоть, сожрать, задушить и т.д [/spoiler] убить, подношением "Memento Mori".
С тем, что [strike] все знают [/strike] является основным геймплеем игры, мы ознакомились, начинаем рассказывать про плюсы и минусы.

　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 Плюсы:　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 
1) Разнообразие маньяков и их способностей, сурвов и их "перков". Так все сурвы одинаковые. Только парни больше по "габаритам".
2) В отличии от похожей на DBD "Friday The 13th: The game" тут можно выбрать кем ты хочешь быть, сурвом или маньяком. В F13game рандом.
3) Малое количество багов. "В отличии от похожей на DBD "Friday The 13th: The game""
4) Малое количество читеров, из-за оперативных банов "В отличии от похожей на DBD "Friday The 13th: The game" который раз уже повторяю"
5) Иногда проводят "ивенты", которые довольно таки интересные)

　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 Минусы:
1) Донат тут обязателен. Ну, если ты хочешь себе маньяка из фильма или крутой перк. [spoiler] Рано или поздно тебе понадобятся перки Лори Строуд, перки Доктора, Ведьмы и много ещё кого [/spoiler]
2) Токсики. Или же "Toxic player's", у которых по несколько тысяч часов, легаси/3-й престиж и тяжёлый фонарь с 2-мя батареями. Против них очень тяжело играть и они пытаются вывести тебя на нервы, чтобы ты ливнул или стал ещё более растерянным/неуклюжим.
3) Кемперы. Это хуже тунеллинга "который не будет в минусах, т.к не считаю это за минус" Тебя могли положить в самом начале катки и... нет, тебя не спасут, т.к [strike] это чмо [/strike] этот "проффи" решил тебя закемпить, т.к ты мансил от него больше минуты! Нужно надеется только на других сурвов которые с "Часами" aka Одолженным временем, и что тебя потеряет ман, после того как ты от него немного побегал с часиками.
4) Баг, который не кидает 4-го сурва [strike] на верную гибель [/strike] в лобби.
5) Фулл пати сурвов. Если это ещё и токсики с фонариками, то [strike] тобi пi3да [/strike] выходи из лоби, [strike] тiкай з городу! [/strike] и создавай новое))

Я постарался всё объяснить как есть, буду редактировать этот обзор, если найду ещё плюсов или минусов.
Игру я рекомендую, т.к, она интересная, даже если она и кажется обнообразной)
Хорошая игра.  С неплохим геймплеем. Самое то для фана с друзьями

Algo que eu tenho notado é a má otimização, eu NÃO tenho os requisitos recomendados porque minha memória RAM é de apenas 5GB (4,8GB), e o resultado da performance é o mesmo quando eu coloco os gráficos no máximo de quando eu coloco no médio. Também não seria o processador, muito menos a placa de vídeo (GTX 1050Ti). Enfim, alguns lags são constantes e não chegam a impossibilitar a jogatina, apenas a dificulta e a torna mais 'maçante'.

Quanto à jogabilidade, o jogo pesa bastante pro lado dos sobreviventes pelo simples fato de que os assassinos têm vantagens extremamente injustas, então a menos que você esteja jogando com amigos que vão te ajudar e distrair o assassino, terá muita dificuldade em realizar a fuga. Tanto é que eu acho que é por isso que esse jogo é tão elogiado por alguns jogadores HARDECORES VIDA LOKA DIFICULDADE MAXIMAAAAAA.

Se está procurando um jogo de terror/suspense equilibrado, não compre Dead By Daylight. Agora. se quer botar pra [spoiler]fuder[/spoiler] e ter horas de diversão com teus colegas... vá em frente.

Depois de jogar DBD por um tempo e ser rank 1 survivor e rank 3 de killer(n curto jogar de killer para ser sincero) decidi fazer uma análise dando a minha opinião. 

Não recomendo o DBD pois, a empresa do game está mais interessada em ganhar dinheiro com skins que eles soltam toda semana, do que realmente arrumar o jogo, a falta de servidores dedicados chega a ser ridículo, no DBD o Killer é quem Hosteia a sala, ou seja, para ele nunca terá problemas, enquanto que os survivors sofrem por causa de lag, outra coisa que chega a ser frustrante é como o balanceamento dos killer é mal feita, hoje existem 12 killers no game, enquanto 10 precisam de bufs para poder chegar a um nível equilibrado com os survivors, outros 2 precisam urgentemente de nerfs, isso faz com que quando você pegue rank alto de survivor(1-4) você só jogue na maioria das partidas contra esses 2 killers que são quebrados, tornando o jogo chato, acredito que a graça do DBD quando se está jogando de survivor seja a diversidade de killers, para que cada partida você tenha uma experiencia diferente e não ficar todo game contra os mesmos 2 killers. 

Sobre o rank do game, atualmente o player começa no rank 20 tanto de killer quanto de survivor, e conforme você vai bem nas partidas você sobe chegando até o topo(rank 1), interessante o sistema, mas muito mal feito, quando se alcança o Rank 1 em ambos os lados você reparara que o nível de jogabilidade tanto de survivors quanto de killers rank 1 é absurdamente diferente, porque na realidade é muito fácil chegar ao rank 1 depois que você aprende coisas básicas do game, mas isso só acontece ao meu ver porque o sistema de como se sobe de rank no jogo foi feito nas coxas. 

Outra coisa que me incomoda no jogo, vamos voltar ao assunto do killer ser o Host, é que na maioria dás vezes o jogo se torna chato para quem quer jogar junto com amigos de survivor, porque além do Killer ser o Host, ele consegue ver todos os 4 survivors contra quem ele joga, e geralmente muitos killers simplesmente quitam da partida por ver que estão contra um grupo de amigos ou contra alguém que ele tenha perdido antes, fazendo o survivor ficar em um lobby simulator, eu não quero nem comentar do lobby do game, porque é o pior que já vi na história de um jogo, tem jogo online no face que tem o lobby melhor haha. 

Enfim, espero que a empresa comece a usar todo dinheiro que ela ganha com dlcs( que não são baratas) e com um monte de skin que eles lançam toda semana, para investir em servidores dedicados, balanceamento de killer/survivor, um lobby decente, fix de bugs, etc. 

Apesar de gostar muito do jogo estou dando uma análise negativa pelos motivos citados acima. 

LEMBRANDO que essa análise é apenas minha OPINIAO, e cada um tem a sua, bjs.
Great game, repair the generators while evading the killer in order to escape! Once you get down to the nitty gritty it's basically a game of hide and seek but an immensely enjoyable one at that.

한 줄 평
심리전 같은거 좋아하거나 자신이 매니악한 지뢰나 똥겜을 좋아하는 변태 같다 싶으면 재밌음.(나또한)
게임 자체만 놓고 보면(요리로 치자면 요리재료) 확실히 이 만한 게임이 없을 정도로 좋은데
다소 엉뚱한 운영으로 인해 망한 케이스.



장점
1. 신박한 게임성.
2. 찰진(?) 타격감 및 조작감
3. 의외로 잘 만들어진 캐릭터들과 잘 묘사된 영화 캐릭터들.
4. 게임 자체의 진입은 어려우나, 한번 이해하고 빠지게되면 쉬움.

단점
게임측의 단점
1. 괴랄한 진입장벽.
2. 트롤링이나 티베깅, 불법 프로그램에 대한 대처 미흡.
3. 이제는 컨텐츠로 자리 잡은 각종 버그와 서버문제.
4. 신박한 게임성에도 불구하고 다소 부족한 컨텐츠.
5. 밸런스. 완벽한 밸런스를 바라는것은 아니지만, 제작진 측에서 밸런스 관련해 너무 무지함.
6. 개발진측의 영문을 알 수 없는 태도와 운영 방향.
7. 이 게임 장르에 대한 정체성 문제.
8. 큰 단점은 아니지만, 그래픽과 최적화에도 하자가 있다.
9. 거지같은 매칭시스템.
10. 랭킹에 따른 보상도 없으면서 랭크 초기화는 매달함.

유저측의 단점
1. 난무하는 각종 티베깅 및 매질 문제.
2. 1번과 더불어 게임중 수틀리면 랜뽑이나 핑그랩.
3. 생조ㅈ마든 살징징이든 서로 이해할 생각은 없고 무턱대고 헐뜯고 징징대는 문제.
4. 게임이 어려운것도 맞고 똥겜인것도 맞지만, 찾아보지도 않고 무조건 까고 보는 문제.



기타 할말.
1. 데바데 고인물까지는 아니지만 어느 정도는 해보았다고 자부함.
2. 메튜는 개발진중 하나인데, 평소에 유저들에게 경솔한 답변을 많이해서 욕을 먹는데, 그 덕에 유명인사가 되었다.
3. DLC는 무조건 거의 사야한다 생각해야한다.(....)
4. 캠핑, 터널링, 인성존 돌기, 후레쉬는 티베깅이 아니다, 허나 상대를 봐가면서 하자. 특히 데린이들한테 그러지좀 말자....
5. 개발진이 욕먹을 만한 건 사실이나, 이 게임 유저들도 정상이 몇 없다는 걸 알아야 한다.
6. 현재 밸런스가 생존자가 불리하다고 주장하는 사람이 많던데, 그냥 둘 다 비슷한것 같다.
주관적 의견으로는 살인마가 더 불리한것 같은데, 판단은 스스로.

Looping simulator.

I enjoy this game quite a bit...

Pros: 
Gets your heart rate up so you don't have to do any exercise.
Spend countless hours dying as survivor and killing as killer which leaves less time to do chores :D
Special Events every few months for extra blood points which is part of the in game points system that helps you rank up.

Cons:
Gets you heart rate up so you don't have to do any exercise; which means you will probably die from blood clots, stroke or aneurysm.
Spend countless hours dying as surviovr and killing as killer which leaves less time to do chores; which means you get grounded for shirking your responsiblities and probably turn into a potato.
Special Events every few months for extra blood points which is part of the in game points system that helps you rank up; but due to the patches being buggy your PC will crash and you will lose all offerings, get no points and de-pip or derank all the time...

Gutes Spiel
Man muss sich am Anfang etwas eingewöhnen und dem Spiel eine Chance geben, aber mit Freunden kann es dann zu Stundenlangen Sessions kommen, die enorm unterhaltsam sind. Manchmal sind die Killer etwas nervig und die Community ist ziemlich salzig, aber im Großen und Ganzen macht das Spiel super viel Spaß und ich kann es mir nicht mehr wegdenken.
Klare Kaufempfehlung und im Sale für 9,99 ist es einfach nur ein Schnapper, aber 19,99 sind auch vollkommen in Ordnung.

I've played the game through its ups and downs and i think its time to finally put a review. Now, a lot of people out there will give you different view points into the game based upon their desired main. That is split between two groups- killer mains, and survivor mains. Killer mains in this game are toxic. Toxic as fuck. It pretty funny honestly, unless youre in a game and get the sweatiest boi that 4 man slugs your team with a 3 blink hitscan nurse or a 3 second rev chainsaw billy. These will be most of your low rank (late game) killers because they just love being sadistic and getting that sweet sweet merciless victory. Now, when you first by the game, you wont have to wrory about this too much as a survivor because most new killers are pretty brain dead unless they watch tutorials (just saying, theyre pretty blind). It won't last too long. The game does a terrible job at balancing things for new players, and i find that bringing new friends into the game actually ruins the experiance for them because unless i have 3 friends with rank 20, my rank 1 status will net us a rank 10 killer and that just ends terribly for them. 
Now, on to the other type of people in this game and the group i am a part of. The salty survivors. These are the saltiest bois of the seven seas. True champs of overcoming strife. If you have ever wanted to hate yourself more, with a long list of nerfs and zero buffs for the past year and a half- this is your group. They are the people of the game who just want to have fun but have to deal with the constant reworks that put killers in favor (rip brand new part) because the devs are too childish to balance their own game properly. Yes we get its a killer game- but when the devs actually make bringing certain items into matches useless (rip flashlight saving), it kind of kills the drive to continue playing. 
Killer mains will tell you to get the game- buybuybuy, its good, its great. And they arent wrong. The devs basicallly serve the survivors to the killer now. Its easy as hell to win. 
Survivor mains will tell you to wait for the next buff (never), or get it on sale. 
I say, unless its on sale, and you have about 6+ friends willing to jump into hell with you, the game in its current stage just isnt worth playing. There are too many things the devs keep changing that will wreck with a new players perspective to the game- whether that be the rediculous pick up times or the new buggy ass pallets. 
In the end its your money, and unless you are ready to invest a good 100 hours in to this game just to get a few decent player perks, you should just buy monster hunter world.

Aboslutely unplayable, I was getting 10-15 FPS even when I turned the graphics to low, absoulutely canot hit skill checks and it seems that Vsync is forced on and canot be turned off. So half the time I was randomely teleporting through the map and being confused as crap as what the hell is going on, while the other time, I had 5 FPS and screwing up my teamates because I canot hit a skill check and lagging behind when I vault through windows. Devs, please make turning off Vsync a thing and a better optimization system because I want to play this game. But I can't because of all the crap I talked about.

Hi.
If you are considering purchasing this game, short answer is: do not do this.

Now the long one:
1) Developers encourage and say they will not do anything with camping. Camping is when killer hangs survivor on hook and stays in close vincity of that hook or literally face camp - stays in from of the hook so saving is impossible.
Now Killers say - you can go do generators in that time.. but.. You will do max of 2 gens in that time because the health bar is going a bit too fast.
2) This game has more bugs and bullshit then actually working features. Just watch some vids online, some funny compilations and you`ll see. But not the bugs are what is the most annoying.. I`ll spread it on other points.
3) You can use boards to block killer.. yeah.. if only they work properly.. If you are running away from the killer and passing the board, it will work as intended. ok. But.. If you stay behind the board and want to hit killer with it - the trigger box is idiotic and most of the times you just hit space and nothing happens.. same if you want to run to it towards the incomming killer, you stop and hit space - it usually thinks you are running away so you dash towards killer and board is falling behind you blocking you with killer :)
4) Its great devs give players a way to jump through windows.. Sad thing is that killer can just hit you anyway.. Lots of vids when surv is behind window, should be save but gets hit anyway.. Or cut with chainsaw..
5) again, bugs, bugs, bugs.. Like I dropped board (pallet) and killer rushing with chainsaw cuts the pallet (thats correct).. AND ME ON THE OTHER SIDE TOO.. bullshit..
6) I mentioned it before. The absolute game braking idiotic thing. The one thing that makes playing this game a bad idea.. This game is Peer To Peer. Killer is the host, you as survivors connect to the killers computer.. So if killer has shitty internet or, what is incredibly populat - lagswitch - you are teleporting like crazy when killer has no lags at all. 
That peer to peer architecture has one more downside.. Because you are not connected to any dbd servers, cheats are everywhere :D They use easy antycheat but cmon, it checks game files and everywhere are proves it can be bypassed. 

So.. This game BY DESIGN is done wrong. And sad thing is that not only the design is bad, but implementation too ;) This game is based on mind games survivors vs killers, and these basicly dont exist as you 8 out of 10 times die because of buggs, killer laggs or some bullshit thing happening. 

DO NOT BUY IT! Devs are not fixing it anyway. They just make new cosmetics and "balance" updates that only brake this game more and more :D Its just pathetic.

其实大家想一下，你天天玩屠夫的匹配一局就是3~4分钟，人类秒匹，那你玩屠夫输了这心态必然崩(我等了这么久还输退游吧还是)，所以就死抓一个，搞死一个是一个，低端局快乐杨永信，每次被我看死的都加我qq骂我.....(这steam名得改了)

Valla juegazo es recomendable al 100 % si te gustan los juegos de supervivencia horror cooperativo, ya que te emerge un mundo desconocido en otra dimension que ya conocias en donde los supervivientes no recuerdan nada de su pasado y de como llegaron aquí, te encariñas con los supervivientes ya que cada uno tiene habilidades difertes y carismas diferentes, en cambio los asesinos son brutales, sadicos, fuertes, etc. Cada uno con una historia diferente por que en algun momento ellos fueron humanos. En pocas palabras es un excelente juego para jugar con amigos o ya sea cooperativo la adrenalina de escapar, de no ser sacrificado o matado por el propio asesino te pone aprueba. Si eres de los que le gustan los juegos de ser discretos, callados totalmente un ninja este es el juego recomendable, ya que importan muchos tus acciones que hagas y los más importante no hagas ruido.

Bueno todo lo anterior esta muy bien cuál es el pero, la comunidad tóxica últimamente abundan las premades toxicas y eso arruina mucho el juego en especial para los nuevos jugadores ya que no entienden de cómo van todas las mecánicas del juego y esto a los jugadores nuevos le dan una bienvenida asquerosa y no van a jugar si no a molestar al killer, el sistema que tiene behavior de emparejamiento es horrible y por eso se ven los típicos rangos morados, verdes, amarillos y grises. Las típicas premades toxicas ah pero se topan con un killer que si sabe jugar los matan y le dicen de todo.,hacker, campero, tunelero,etc.

En fin es un muy buen juego y me gusta jugarlo pero la comunidad tóxica lo arruina por eso cada vez hay menos killers por lo tanto cuesta encontrar partida como superviviente pero como killer la encuentras rápido...urge arreglar el sistema de emperajamiento para que sea una manera más buena de jugar pero ojo esto no quiere decir que solucione lo de la comunidad y premades tóxicas.
Супир игра , класная, кемпиров нету, всем саветую!!!

Самая худшая реализация подобного жанра. Нормальные разработчики, выпуская обновления, стараются улучшить свою игру, эти же делают только хуже... То что работала с релиза хорошо, на данный момент работает плохо или не работает вообще, старые баги все еще имеют место быть, так же полно читеров и далеко не всех палит изиантичит. Вообщем на данный момент игра не достойна даже оценки 2/10. Тем кто еще ее не купил, однозначно не покупать.
